name: Deathspresso
description:
You awake after dying by Death. Death offers you the chance to be reincarnated or brought back to life if you do one favor...You need to...

Make Death a Coffee

This is a point and click game and my first time trying to make one. The cursor is known to glitch out but still work if hovered over something that changes the cursor.

Please comment any missing files if they pop up. I missed the deadline by a few hours due to falling asleep and my laptop dying didn't save any of my final stuff!

Current version 0.1

0.1 Fixed a bug where one of the holes in the kitchen would crash the game for an unknown reason.
